title: Dinosaur Watch Faces
description: Dinosaur Watch FacesChoose from SIX dinosaurs: Ankylosaurus, Brontosaurus, Stegosaurus, T-Rex, Triceratops and Velociraptor! All your favorite critters from the Mesozoic Era!Add some fun illustrations to your Android Wear watch! All dinosaurs work on circular and square watches. To access the different backgrounds:•   When changing watch faces, scroll to "Dinosaur Watch Faces" and click the gear icon below it.•   Scroll through the six background options.•   Select the background by tapping on the name.Add some fun and unique imagery to your Android Wear watch face!Please note: Dinosaur Watch Faces may take some time to appear on your Android Wear Watch. Be patient, it WILL show up!
descriptionHTML:
Dinosaur Watch Faces

Choose from SIX dinosaurs: Ankylosaurus, Brontosaurus, Stegosaurus, T-Rex, Triceratops and Velociraptor! All your favorite critters from the Mesozoic Era!

Add some fun illustrations to your Android Wear watch! All dinosaurs work on circular and square watches.

To access the different backgrounds:
•  When changing watch faces, scroll to "Dinosaur Watch Faces" and click the gear icon below it.
•  Scroll through the six background options.
•  Select the background by tapping on the name.


Add some fun and unique imagery to your Android Wear watch face!

Please note: Dinosaur Watch Faces may take some time to appear on your Android Wear Watch. Be patient, it WILL show up!
comments: I can't seem to get the Trex and velociraptor to use as background on both my LG G watch R and Sony SmartWatch 3
Uninstalled, reinstalled, prompted on watch to install on watch, all great now. Excellent Developer, quick to respond
Works great on my ZTE smartwatch, but would like digital option.
I'm a paleontologist teaching a class on dinosaurs. Will see if my students notice this! Looks great on my Huawei watch and the battery level and steps are a nice touch.
Great fun. Would like to be able to change the face on the phone rather than the watch. Would also like the Dino outlined in ambient mode. Still love though.
Super fun! It's a nice break from serious and ugly watch faces
recentChanges: Updated ambient mode so notification text does not run into the battery level
